headline.main: SHIPPING AND MAILS; DAYLIGHT SAVING TIME

docs.snippet: LONDON, Sept. 13--The official British belief that Germany may attempt to establish submarine and air bases in South and Central America was expressed tonight.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 13--The official British belief that Germany may attempt to establish submarine and air bases in South and Central America was expressed tonight.
docs.abstract: Brit warns Germany may try to build submarine and air bases in Latin Amer

headline.main: Britain Warns That Reich May Try to Build Submarine and Air Bases in Latin America; BRITAIN CAUTIONS ON U-BOAT BASES

docs.snippet: After twenty-four hours of apparent inactivity, German submarines struck again at British merchant shipping yesterday and sank two ships, one an 8,431-ton oil tanker, the British Influence, bound for Dover, England, from the Arabian seaport of...
docs.lead_paragraph: After twenty-four hours of apparent inactivity, German submarines struck again at British merchant shipping yesterday and sank two ships, one an 8,431-ton oil tanker, the British Influence, bound for Dover, England, from the Arabian seaport of Abadan.
docs.abstract: preventive steps reptd; Germany denies charge

headline.main: Two More British Ships Sunk by U-Boats; Tanker and Freighter Make Allied Total 19; U-BOAT TOLL ADDS TWO BRITISH SHIPS

docs.snippet: South America loomed large yesterday in the World's Fair's 1940 plans. With the question of European participation so muddled by the war, and with reports of both extreme dissatisfaction and satisfaction...
docs.lead_paragraph: South America loomed large yesterday in the World's Fair's 1940 plans. With the question of European participation so muddled by the war, and with reports of both extreme dissatisfaction and satisfaction...
docs.abstract: To exhibit at 1940 N Y World's Fair

headline.main: 1940 FAIR TURNING TO SOUTH AMERICA; Weighs Sending Envoy to 'Sell' Participation to Offset Any European Withdrawals CHILE'S SUPPORT UNLIKELY Ecuador Is Disappointed but Plans to Return Next Year as Good-Will Gesture

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 15--The Argentine fleet was ordered to sea today to begin a strict patrol of the entire Patagonian coast between Bahia Blanca and the Straits of Magellan to prevent any violation of neutrality. The naval air force also began...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 15--The Argentine fleet was ordered to sea today to begin a strict patrol of the entire Patagonian coast between Bahia Blanca and the Straits of Magellan to prevent any violation of neutrality. The naval air force also began cooperating with this patrol.

headline.main: ARGENTINA GUARDS COAST; Fleet Is Ordered on Patrol Duty to Protect Neutrality

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: A Poland already tottering under the blows of the German military machine was subjected to another invasion last might, this time by Soviet forces, according to an official announcement in Berlin.
docs.lead_paragraph: A Poland already tottering under the blows of the German military machine was subjected to another invasion last might, this time by Soviet forces, according to an official announcement in Berlin.
docs.abstract: Germans issue ultimatum to Poles to quit Warsaw

docs.snippet: The seventeenth annual women's New Jersey State golf championship will be held on the Upper Montclair Country Club course starting tomor-- row and continuing through Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: The seventeenth annual women's New Jersey State golf championship will be held on the Upper Montclair Country Club course starting tomor-- row and continuing through Friday.
